lede: Statistics on sexuality are obtained from large surveys which ask people to state their sexuality. Time series data on sexual identities is also available.

bulletins.summary: Findings on health, smoking, sexual identity and other social topics compiled from the UK Integrated Household Survey (IHS) between April 2011 to March 2012.
bulletins.name: Integrated Household Survey April 2011 to March 2012- Experimental Statistics

name: Sexuality
